alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 16 at 7:52PM AKST until February 18 at 7:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 16 inches possible. * WHERE...Valdez and Thompson Pass. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A mix of rain and snow will develop across the Valdez area by late Thursday morning. Mixed rain/snow is then expected to transition to all snow by Thursday afternoon. Heavy snow is possible late Thursday afternoon through early Friday morning with snowfall rates of up to 2 inches per hour at times. There is still some uncertainty as to the exact timing of the transition of rain to snow. Any prolonged rain/snow mix would reduce expected snow accumulations.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
